Repeat to them the precious assurance which God Himself has given to them: I am "The Lord, The Lord God, merciful and gracious, longsuffering, and abundant 


                                    -303- 

in goodness and truth, keeping mercy for thousands, forgiving iniquity and transgression and sin" (Exodus 34:6, 7). What a precious declaration is this! What can be too hard for Him, what sin too great for Him to pardon? He is gracious, not working according to our merit, but in His boundless goodness healing our backslidings, forgiving our iniquities, and loving us freely while we were yet sinners.
